# fmc_network_objects (Resource)

Resource for Network Objects in FMC

## Example
An example is shown below: 
```hcl
resource "fmc_network_objects" "PrivateVLANDR" {
  name        = "VLAN-Private-DRsite"
  value       = "10.10.10.0/24"
  description = "Terraform DR network object"
}
```
